node.excerpt: Introduction Early this year we announced our plans for Fantomas 6. We are happy to announce that we have wrapped up the development of version 6 and a preview is now available on NuGet. What’s new? Fantomas 6 is a major release and contains a lot of new features and improvements. In this post we will highlight some of the most important changes. Parallel formatting Fantomas 6 is now able to format multiple files in parallel. This is a huge improvement for large projects.
